text.0: In my latest article for @FerretScot I spoke to a Glasgow mother about why she is seeking permission to bring a Supreme Court case over the amount of money her disabled son should have to pay for his council-funded care  https://t.co/SirZwxrUpz
text.1: EXC - A Glasgow mother is planning to take Glasgow City Council to the Supreme Court in a legal battle over care for her son, who has Down's Syndrome.https://t.co/gjzdkUyHTt
